## Publications


```{r publist}
ls_pubs <- get_publications("y-t4A90AAAAJ&hl") |> 
  mutate(cites = paste0("**(citations: ", cites,")**")) |> 
  unite("full", c(author, year, title, journal, number, cites), sep = ", ")
```




*Citations according to Google Scholar*
